ayahs.text: [{"word_arabic":"يُرْسَلُ","word_ayah":35,"word_number_in_ayah":1,"word_number_in_quran":68690,"word_number_in_surah":152,"word_translation":"Will be sent","word_transliteration":"yur'salu"},{"word_arabic":"عَلَيْكُمَا","word_ayah":35,"word_number_in_ayah":2,"word_number_in_quran":68691,"word_number_in_surah":153,"word_translation":"against both of you","word_transliteration":"alaykuma"},{"word_arabic":"شُوَاظٌ","word_ayah":35,"word_number_in_ayah":3,"word_number_in_quran":68692,"word_number_in_surah":154,"word_translation":"a flame","word_transliteration":"shuwazun"},{"word_arabic":"مِّن","word_ayah":35,"word_number_in_ayah":4,"word_number_in_quran":68693,"word_number_in_surah":155,"word_translation":"of","word_transliteration":"min"},{"word_arabic":"نَّارٍ","word_ayah":35,"word_number_in_ayah":5,"word_number_in_quran":68694,"word_number_in_surah":156,"word_translation":"fire","word_transliteration":"narin"},{"word_arabic":"وَنُحَاسٌ","word_ayah":35,"word_number_in_ayah":6,"word_number_in_quran":68695,"word_number_in_surah":157,"word_translation":"and smoke","word_transliteration":"wanuhasun"},{"word_arabic":"فَلَا","word_ayah":35,"word_number_in_ayah":7,"word_number_in_quran":68696,"word_number_in_surah":158,"word_translation":"and not","word_transliteration":"fala"},{"word_arabic":"تَنتَصِرَانِ","word_ayah":35,"word_number_in_ayah":8,"word_number_in_quran":68697,"word_number_in_surah":159,"word_translation":"you will (be able to) defend yourselves","word_transliteration":"tantasirani"}]
